tn.text: Yahweh is talking to Ezekiel in this section.
"Yahweh spoke his word." See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:ezk:01:01|1:1]]. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_idiom]])

tn.ref: how is a vine better than any tree with branches that is among the trees in a forest?
tn.text: AT: "the vine is not better than any tree with branches that is among the trees in a forest." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])

tn.ref: Do people take wood from a vine to make anything?
tn.text: AT: "People do not take wood from a vine to make anything." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])

tn.ref: do they make a peg from it to hang anything on it?
tn.text: AT: "they do not make a peg from it to hang things on it." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])

tn.ref: If it is thrown into a fire as fuel, and if the fire has burned both of its ends and also the middle, is it good for anything?
tn.text: AT: if the fire has burned both of its ends and also the middle, it certainly is not good for anything! - (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
Yahweh continues speaking about the vine.
Yahweh speak to Ezekiel about the people of Israel.
a place where everyone has left.

tn.ref: this is the Lord Yahweh's declaration
tn.text: See how you translated this in [[:en:bible:notes:ezk:05:11|5:11]].
